p:
E. grandiflorum leaves were purchased from local market of Faisalabad-Pakistan and were taxonomically identified and confirmed from Department of Botany, Government College University, Faisalabad-Pakistan. It was well reported that ethanol and methanol act as effective solvents for the extraction of antioxidant phenolic compounds.
15 So aqueous Ethanolic (30:70) plant extract was prepared and dry leaves were sonicated twice with 10 timeâ€™s higher volume of hydro alcohol for 48 hours at room temperature. Then the solution was filtered by Whatman filter paper number 1 and evaporated using rotary evaporator under reduced pressure.
